revision.text: ==English== {{swp}} ===Etymology=== {{translit|en|hi|यादव}}, {{translit|en|ne|यादव|notext=1}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|s|Yadav}} # A member of a grouping of traditionally non-elite, peasant-pastoral communities or castes in the Indian Subcontinent. ===Proper noun=== {{en-prop|Yadavs}} # {{surname|en|from=Sanskrit}}. ====Statistics==== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yadav'' is the 15734<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 1853 individuals. ''Yadav'' is most common among Asian/Pacific Islander (94.01%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}} [[Category:English eponyms]]
